attributes.action: The government to take serious action against global warming & our environment
attributes.background: We have 11 years before the damage we have done to the planet is non reversible, the government need to take this more serious as nothing is being done, things such as ocean clean ups, something practical to replace most plastic, more biodegradable products!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/240178
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232684
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/254607
